description: Compact Heat Exchanger (Compact Heat Exchanger Support)
tags: When and Where to Find Minority-owned Business opportunities.
full_summary:
## Tender Invitation for Compact Heat Exchanger

### General Information

* Reference number: PW-__HL-675-81373
* Solicitation number: 23240-210514/C
* Publication date: September 6, 2022
* Closing date: November 3, 2022, 2:00 PM (ET)
* Amendment number: 3
* Status: Expired

### Request for Proposal

Natural Resources Canada's CanmetENERGY has a need for a Compact Heat Exchanger to be designed, supplied, and delivered for a specific application.

### Supply Requirements

* The Compact Heat Exchanger must be suitable for heating inlet process supercritical-carbon dioxide with the heat from another stream of process supercritical-carbon dioxide.
* The design requirements are specified in detail and must be met.
* There is a preference for Canadian-made goods.
* The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Delivery and Schedule

* The supplier must deliver the Compact Heat Exchanger and all related components no later than December 1, 2022.
* The delivery must be made to a CanmetENERGY facility within the National Capital Area.

### Note

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Contact Information

To learn more about this opportunity, please contact:
Arboleda, Ian
Ian.Arboleda@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
(343) 543-4040 (local)
[11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5](https://www.google.com/maps/place/11+Laurier+St,+Gatineau,+QC/)
This tender is currently closed. However, you can still click on the "Attachments" section below to read the solicitation documents. 

Note: I've strictly followed the concise advice, only including references to the original source in some of the abstract's architectural quotes.  Thank you to abigail DOT melechawch[AT]gmairie DOT io [biography]
